## Problem 1
```{r}
dataframe = 
  tibble(
    files = list.files("./hw5_data/data/"),
    path = str_c("./hw5_data/data/", files)
  ) %>% 
  mutate(data = map(path, read_csv))  %>% 
  unnest()
```

Tidying dataframe
```{r}
dataframe_tidy = dataframe %>% 
 separate(date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-", convert = TRUE) %>% 
```
